scripts.test: TRACE=true EE=true pnpm exec playwright test --workers=4
scripts.test:shard:1: TRACE=true EE=true pnpm exec playwright test --workers=4 --shard=1/3
scripts.test:shard:2: TRACE=true EE=true pnpm exec playwright test --workers=4 --shard=2/3
scripts.test:shard:3: TRACE=true EE=true pnpm exec playwright test --workers=4 --shard=3/3
scripts.test:repeat: TRACE=true EE=true pnpm exec playwright test --workers=4 --repeat-each=12
scripts.test:quick: TRACE=true PW_QUICK_TEST=1 EE=true pnpm exec playwright test --workers=4
scripts.test:debug: ./startPlayWrightServer.sh; PW_TEST_REUSE_CONTEXT=1 PW_TEST_CONNECT_WS_ENDPOINT=ws://127.0.0.1:31000/ PWDEBUG=console EE=true pnpm exec playwright test -c playwright.config.ts --headed --project=chromium --retries 0 --timeout 0 --workers 1 --max-failures=1
scripts.test:debug:intelliJ: TRACE=true PWDEBUG=console EE=true pnpm exec playwright test --trace on -c playwright.config.ts --headed --project=chromium --retries 0 --workers 1 --max-failures=1
scripts.test:debug:watch: pnpm dlx nodemon -e ts -w ./ -x "pnpm run test:debug"
scripts.test:debug:quick:sqlite: ./startPlayWrightServer.sh; PW_QUICK_TEST=1 PW_TEST_REUSE_CONTEXT=1 PW_TEST_CONNECT_WS_ENDPOINT=ws://127.0.0.1:31000/ PWDEBUG=console EE=true pnpm exec playwright test -c playwright.config.ts --headed --project=chromium --retries 0 --timeout 5 --workers 1 --max-failures=1
scripts.ci:test:mysql: E2E_DB_TYPE=mysql EE=true pnpm exec playwright test --workers=2
scripts.ci:test:pg: E2E_DB_TYPE=pg EE=true pnpm exec playwright test --workers=2
